property.searchPlaceholder: Search for a property or enter a custom label...

spaceGraph.title: Space Graph
spaceGraph.intro: The Space Graph is a visual representation of interconnected knowledge. Each space contains nodes and edges that form a semantic network.

nodes.title: Nodes
nodes.wikidataEntities: Wikidata Entities: Nodes are created from Wikidata, bringing structured knowledge into your space
nodes.properties: Properties: Each node can have multiple properties with values (e.g., "birth date", "location", "occupation")
nodes.locationData: Location Data: Nodes can have geographical information (country, city, district, street, coordinates)

edges.title: Edges
edges.relationships: Relationships: Edges connect nodes and represent semantic relationships
edges.directionality: Directionality: Edges have a source and target (e.g., "Person A" → "works for" → "Company B")
edges.properties: Properties: Edges can also have their own properties to add more context

spaceGraph.tipClickNode: Tip: Click on any node or edge in the graph to view details, edit properties or see relationships.
spaceGraph.tipNodeExpansion: Tip: A node expands in size when additional connections are added, indicating increased relevance and activity.

simpleSearch.title: Simple Text Search
simpleSearch.description: Use the search bar to quickly find nodes and edges by their labels, descriptions or property values. Results show both nodes and edges that match your query.

advancedSearch.title: Advanced Property Search
advancedSearch.description: Click Advanced Search to build complex queries:
advancedSearch.propertyBased: Property-based: Search by specific properties (e.g., "instance of")
advancedSearch.multipleCriteria: Multiple Criteria: Combine multiple search conditions with AND/OR logic

collaborators.title: Collaborators & Permissions
collaborators.intro: Spaces are collaborative environments where multiple users can contribute to building knowledge graphs.
collaborators.joinCollaborator: Join as Collaborator: Click "Join Space" to become a collaborator and start editing
collaborators.addNodesEdges: Add Nodes & Edges: Collaborators can add new nodes from Wikidata and create relationships
collaborators.editDelete: Edit & Delete: Modify node properties, update descriptions or remove elements

discussions.title: Discussion Panel
discussions.intro: The discussion panel enables communication and collaboration among space members.
discussions.startDiscussions: Start Discussions: Collaborators can create new discussion threads about the space
discussions.replyReact: Reply & React: Engage with discussions through reactions.

activity.title: Activity Stream
activity.intro: The activity stream shows recent actions in the space, helping you stay updated on changes.
activity.realtimeUpdates: Real-time Updates: See who added nodes, created edges or updated properties

location.title: Location & Maps
location.intro: Spaces and nodes can have geographical context:
location.spaceLocation: Space Location: Set a location for your entire space (visible at the top of the page)
location.nodeLocations: Node Locations: Add specific locations to individual nodes with coordinates
location.mapVisualization: Map Visualization: Click "Show Space Map" to see all nodes with locations on an interactive map
